Regulation Name(s): Quality Control Material, Assayed and Unassayed
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Prodigy Blood Glucose Test System using electrochemical meter and dry reagent biosensor test strips for quantitative measurement of glucose.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from fingertip and palm for monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control; for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes at home; not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates.
